body_html:
We moved the models/ directory to https://github.com/tensorflow/models because that makes more sense. We will likely do more such moves as you describe: we will likely keep a small number of small examples, but possibly less than we have. contrib is definitely a target for moving to its own repo, but we have to figure out a bunch of tooling to make that work well. As you say, tensorboard is also not required in the main repo, but we have no immediate plans to move it.

These changes will make it easier for us to maintain these components. Please bear with us, I know these changes can be disruptive.

We will likely do more such moves as you describe: we will likely keep a small number of small examples, but possibly less than we have. contrib is definitely a target for moving to its own repo, but we have to figure out a bunch of tooling to make that work well. As you say, tensorboard is also not required in the main repo, but we have no immediate plans to move it.
These changes will make it easier for us to maintain these components. Please bear with us, I know these changes can be disruptive.
body:
We moved the models/ directory to https://github.com/tensorflow/models because that makes more sense. We will likely do more such moves as you describe: we will likely keep a small number of small examples, but possibly less than we have. contrib is definitely a target for moving to its own repo, but we have to figure out a bunch of tooling to make that work well. As you say, tensorboard is also not required in the main repo, but we have no immediate plans to move it.

These changes will make it easier for us to maintain these components. Please bear with us, I know these changes can be disruptive.
